title: A Frog Prince
description: "A quirky, imaginative look at events from the frog's point of view. . . . A wonderful book--wry, touching, funny, and completely satisfying".--School Library Journal, starred review. Full color. IRA/CBC Teachers' Choice; winner of the Bologna Book Fair "Critici in Erba" Prize; School Library Journal Best Book.
author: Alix Berenzy
